p: Authors contributed as follow to the conception or design of the work; the acquisition, analysis or interpretation of data for the work; and drafting the work or revising it critically for important intellectual content: CR 30%, CB 15%, ECH 15%, and all others ET, PB, SS, IM, WS, OAP, LAA, ED 5% each. All authors approved the version to be published and agreed to be accountable for all aspects of the work.
